issue.title: [CF 955] Failed to initialise
issue.body:
IMPORTANT: If your issue is only occurring with a specific icon, include an export string of the icon in this ticket. Subsequently, if the issue involves an entire group or an entire profile, include the entire export string of the group or profile.

To get an export string, open the icon editor, and click button labeled "Import/Export/Backup". Select the "To string" option for the appropriate export type (icon, group, or profile), and then press CTRL+C to copy it to your clipboard.

FAILURE TO COMPLY WITH THE ABOVE INSTRUCTIONS WILL RESULT IN YOUR TICKET BEING INVALIDATED.

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Anything! Addon is not working at all
2.
3.

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
Error Message: Tellmewhen cannot preform the action if the addon failed to initialise!

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
7.0.0

Do you have an error log of what happened?

TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen-7.0.0.lua:2863: in function "DoUpgrade"
TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen-7.0.0.lua:3002: in function "UpgradeProfile"
TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen-7.0.0.lua:3352: in function "?"
TellMeWhen.lua:1774: in function "Initialize"
TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen-7.0.0.lua:3121: in function "UpdateNormally"
TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen-7.0.0.lua:3304: in function "Update"
TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen-7.0.0.lua:1877: in function "?"

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)

Tried to reinstall both with curse client and manual install, still fails to initialise.

Also tried disabling every single addon apart from TMW, still it fails to initialise


> Posted by CurseForge user homerclease24 | Imported from CurseForge issue #955 | Raw

comments.body:
That's not the complete error message. I need the entire thing in order to figure out what is going wrong here and to fix the problem. You cut off some of the beginning of and some of the end of it.

Also, please attach your SavedVariables using the process described in the ticket template above.

Edited Jun 20, 2014

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Now a duplicate of http://wow.curseforge.com/addons/tellmewhen/tickets/956-tmw-failing-to-initialize-but-only-on-one-of-several/

Closing this ticket due to insufficient information.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
